text.autoconfig.additive_statuses.title: Additive Statuses
text.autoconfig.additive_statuses.option: If true, when the duration of a status exceeds the Maximum Duration, reset the duration to the Starter Duration value and increase the amplification
A list of effects that won't cycle if Cycle Amplification is enabled
Format is namespace:effect_id and is separated by commas
If true, duration cannot exceed this number
